sequence:
Mysterious Rabbit Alien?!

<size=45>I 「What is the Rabbit Planet?」</size>

scripts.say: Recently, it’s Bailey’s turn to be the Commander's secretary.
Is Commander a bit tired today?~ Let Bailey energize you with my bunny power!
Commander, although stockpiling carrots is a good thing, going a mission to stockpile them will not be beneficial.
Commander, you’ve got new mail! Is it from the Rabbit Planet?
...although Bailey’s appearance doesn’t scream confidence in her ability to handle things, she is full of enthusiasm…
I just received a telepathic wave from the Rabbit Alien, they want me to help with the Commander’s work. So Commander, don’t be afraid to call on me for help~
Exactly what is this… Rabbit Planet?
What’s wrong Commander? Is there something troubles you?

options.content: Ask Bailey about the Rabbit Planet.

scripts.say: Hehe, you can tell Bailey. Let Bailey use the wisdom of the Rabbit Planet to help solve your problem!
Ah, so you all were curious about this.
Hummm~~ How can Bailey explain...Rabbit Planet….is simply a planet full of rabbits!
What kind of implausible answer is that——
